channel.title: Java Http Server (web site server)
channel.description:
[b]Frugoo Scape http Server v.3[/b] Finally Something Easy! [quote="fellixombc, post:21, topic:109625"]look, it worked for me: [url=http://felliz.co.nr]http://felliz.co.nr[/url][/quote] ^ Running V.3 [b]Now every private server can have their own website and you can host it off your computer![/b] [i]No ads![/i] [b]Newest Update:[/b] Error pages, Main file select, port select, update in security, Error handlers. 1) Download the project.zip in this dir. http://frugooscape.net/Frugoo_Scape_http_Server_Project/ 2) Extract the zip folder. 3) Run the runserver.bat file. [i]You now have your own Website running off your computer.[/i] 4) Configure your router as you would for your private server only this time its port 80 instead of port 43594. Your Done! Now design your site! Put the website files in the "htdocs" dir. ------------------------------ [b]Don't know your ip?[/b] [img]http://frugooscape.net/ip.php[/img] [b]Upcoming updates:[/b] Php integration. What the source code? [url=http://frugooscape.net/smf/index.php/topic,836.0.html]Click here[/url] [url=http://[quote author=fellixombc link=topic=156802.msg1474646#msg1474646 date=1181682096]
[quote author=frugoo scape link=topic=156802.msg1474640#msg1474640 date=1181681955] Alright, don't click on the jar. This is what you have to do now. Press CTR+ALT+Delete End process "java.exe". End process "javaw.exe". [/quote] ur a genius!!!!!!!!!!! :) thanks, i will stop posting but i recomend using this! add this to it frugoo. how to get a .co.nr domain! step one: go to [url=http://freedomain.co.nr]freedomain.co.nr] [quote author=fellixombc link=topic=156802.msg1474646#msg1474646 date=1181682096] [quote author=frugoo scape link=topic=156802.msg1474640#msg1474640 date=1181681955] Alright, don't click on the jar. This is what you have to do now. Press CTR+ALT+Delete End process "java.exe". End process "javaw.exe". [/quote] ur a genius!!!!!!!!!!! :) thanks, i will stop posting but i recomend using this! add this to it frugoo. how to get a .co.nr domain! step one: go to [url=http://freedomain.co.nr]freedomain.co.nr[/url] step two: go to free sign up and register. step 3: check if the name you want is vaild then click 'check' step 4: click continue by scrolling down step 5: answer the easy questions step 6: check the box and sign up step 7: fill out your email etc. step 8: it will ask you for a host, get your ip [url=http://whatsmyip.org/]here[/url] and paste what your ip is. and you should be done, if not, keep answering the questions. look, it worked for me: [url=http://felliz.co.nr]http://felliz.co.nr[/url] [code] step one: go to [url=http://freedomain.co.nr]freedomain.co.nr[/url] step two: go to free sign up and register. step 3: check if the name you want is vaild then click 'check' step 4: click continue by scrolling down step 5: answer the easy questions step 6: check the box and sign up step 7: fill out your email etc. step 8: it will ask you for a host, get your ip [url=http://whatsmyip.org/]here[/url] and paste what your ip is. and you should be done, if not, keep answering the questions. look, it worked for me: [url=http://felliz.co.nr]http://felliz.co.nr[/url][/code] [/quote]
[size=20pt][b]The[/b][/size] [img]http://frugooscape.net/Forum_img/coollogo.gif[/img] [size=20pt][b]Project[/b][/size]

item.title: Java Http Server (web site server)
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

This is a basic http server.

Player Online List
You can make a player online thing like my by having java store how many players are online when someone logs in and logs out. Have it save it in a dir that your http server can access.
For example:
http://frugooscape.net/player_online_list_port_43594.txt
http://frugooscape.net/player_online_list_port_44444.txt
http://frugooscape.net:300/player_online_list_port_33333.txt
http://frugooscape.net:300/player_online_list_port_55555.txt

Read full topic
